Articles.Content:
Hi!

In this post I present you the latest military technology. We're talking about a tactical bomber capable of medium altitude and medium speed that deploys a self propelled (solid fuel) and guided bomb.

Here you have a video showing how it works:

Flight instructions:

-Take off at aroung 80 m/s. This will help to avoid hitting the engines on the runway during the rotation.

-Aim at your target and activate SAS.

-Hit "1". This will release the bomb. Then switch to the bomb.

-Hit "2" to activate the bomb's engine and guide it towards your target.

-After the explosion, if the plane is close enough, the camera will switch to it automatically.

-Land it with around 1/3 throttle. Again, this will help to avoid a potential collision off the engines against the ground.

use it at your own risk.

Craft file: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37427917/Heavy%20Bomber.craft
